title: 1976년 Cronk 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Donald E. Cronk
**판결일**: 1976-11-12
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 54 A.D.2d 1133

## 판결문 요약


— Judgment unanimously affirmed. (See People ex rel. Woodruff v Mancusi, 41 AD2d 12.) (Appeal from judgment of Onondaga County Court — burglary, third degree.) Present — Marsh, P. J., Moule, Cardamone, Simons and Goldman, JJ.
